Authors:
Mirca Zotti, Svengunnar Ryman, Stefano Ghignone, Alfredo
Vizzini
Title:
Typification of Octaviania rubescens (Paxillineae, Boletales)
and phylogenetic hypotheses for genus Alpova
Keywords:
Agaricomycetes, hypogeous Boletales, Melanogaster,
Paxillineae, Rhizopogon, Suillineae, 28SrDNA, taxonomy
Abstract:
There are no usable herbarium specimens for the type of
Alpova rubescens;therefore a lectotype and an epitype are designated
hereby to preserve current usage of the name. As lectotype the
Vittadini’s Fig. XII E/Tab. IV (from Monographia Tuberacearum) was
selected. The epitype chosen for A. rubescens is a recent large
collection from Liguria (Italy). Furthermore to investigate the
phylogenetic position of A. rubescens among Alpova spp. comparative
28S-rDNA gene sequence analyses were conducted. The new combination
Rhizopogon alexsmithii (Trappe) Vizzini & Zotti is proposed.
